title: Can we not have to tick the "show detailed descriptions" thing EVERY time we change runes
body: Because currently, click out of runes, click back in, and it's unticked again.

replies.body: Guh, sorry that the experience has been pretty annoying.  We're currently working on fixes for both the detailed description option not saving and the rune page rename issue.  In the meanwhile, it might be easier to press Shift instead of clicking the tick box (it's an alternate shortcut).
In addition, i'm constantly having issues with renaming the rune pages.
